p: Main compounds such as terpenes, eugenol, farnesol, benzoquinone, menthol, and menthone show strong antifungal properties, especially against C. albicans, Candida neoformans, Candida tropicalis, Candida glabrata, and Paracoccidioides brasiliensis [ 45, 54, 56, 58, 91]. In general, EO can disrupt the chitin synthesis in fungal cell walls to causes abnormality in glycoproteins synthesis and mitochondrial structure, as well as in sporulation inhibition [ 81, 82].
